scripts.setup: mkdir -p node_modules && npm r vapi vscript vutil && npm i http://$IP/vscript.tar.gz http://$IP/vapi.tar.gz http://$IP/vutil.tar.gz
scripts.gateway: cd ip-processing-gateway && NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm --no-warnings' node template.ts
scripts.gateway-dynamic-ips: cd ip-processing-gateway && NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm --no-warnings' node template.ts --target_ip=$IP
scripts.gateway-static-ips: cd ip-processing-gateway && NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm --no-warnings' node template.ts --mcast_addr_schema=example_address_schema.json --target_ip=$IP
